options.content:
# SCONE operator controller metrics

This dashboard contains metrics pertaining to the SCONE operator controller, including:

* Certificate read metrics
* Controller runtime metrics
* Go metrics
* Leader election metrics
* Process metrics
* REST client request metrics
* Workqueue metrics

panels.description: Total number of certificate read errors
panels.title: Certificate read errors

panels.description: Total number of certificate reads
panels.title: Total certificate reads

panels.description: Number of currently used workers per controller
panels.title: Controller runtime active workers per controller

panels.description: Total number of reconciliation errors per controller
panels.title: Reconciliation errors per controller

panels.description: Total number of reconciliation panics per controller
panels.title: Reconciliation panics per controller

panels.description: Total number of terminal reconciliation errors per controller
panels.title: Terminal reconciliation errors per controller

panels.description: Total number of reconciliations per controller
panels.title: Reconciliations per controller

panels.description: Maximum number of concurrent reconciles per controller
panels.title: Max concurrent reconciles

panels.description:
Length of time per reconciliation.

99% of reconciliation operations complete within this amount of seconds.
panels.title: Reconcile duration - 99th percentile

panels.description:
Length of time per reconciliation.

50% of reconciliation operations complete within this amount of seconds.
panels.title: Reconcile duration - 50th percentile

panels.description: Total number of webhook panics
panels.title: Webhook panics

panels.description: Current number of admission requests being served.
panels.title: Webhook requests in flight

panels.description: Total number of admission requests by HTTP status code.
panels.title: Admission requests by HTTP status code.

panels.description: Information about the Go environment.
panels.title: Go environment information

panels.description: Total number of goroutines that currently exist.
panels.title: Total goroutines

panels.description: Total number of OS threads created.
panels.title: Total Go threads

panels.description: A summary of the pause duration of garbage collection cycles.
panels.title: Garbage Collection duration

panels.description: Number of bytes allocated and still in use.
panels.title: Allocated bytes in use

panels.description: Total number of bytes allocated, even if freed.
panels.title: Allocated bytes (even if freed)

panels.description: Number of bytes used by the profiling bucket hash table.
panels.title: Profiling bucket hash table bytes

panels.description: Number of bytes used for garbage collection system metadata.
panels.title: Garbage collection metadata bytes in use

panels.description: Timestamp of the last garbage collection.
panels.title: Last garbage collection timestamp

panels.description: Number of heap bytes when next garbage collection will take place.
panels.title: Next garbage collection bytes

panels.description: Total number of frees.
panels.title: Total frees

panels.description: Total number of pointer lookups.
panels.title: Lookups

panels.description: Total number of mallocs
panels.title: Mallocs

panels.description: Number of heap bytes released to OS.
panels.title: Released heap bytes

panels.description: Number of heap bytes that are in use.
panels.title: Heap bytes in use

panels.description: Number of heap bytes allocated and still in use.
panels.title: Allocated heap bytes in use

panels.description: Number of heap bytes waiting to be used.
panels.title: Idle heap bytes

panels.description: Number of heap bytes obtained from system.
panels.title: Heap system bytes

panels.description: Number of allocated heap objects.
panels.title: Allocated heap objects

panels.description: Number of bytes in use by the stack allocator.
panels.title: Stack bytes in use

panels.description: Number of bytes obtained from system for stack allocator.
panels.title: Stack system bytes

panels.description: Number of bytes in use by mcache structures.
panels.title: mcache structure bytes in use

panels.description: Number of bytes used for mcache structures obtained from system.
panels.title: mcache structure system bytes

panels.description: Number of bytes in use by mspan structures.
panels.title: mspan structure bytes in use

panels.description: Number of bytes used for mspan structures obtained from system.
panels.title: mspan structure system bytes

panels.description: Number of bytes obtained from system.
panels.title: System bytes

panels.description: Number of bytes used for other system allocations.
panels.title: Other system allocation bytes

panels.description: Gauge of if the reporting system is master of the relevant lease, 0 indicates backup, 1 indicates master. 'name' is the string used to identify the lease.
panels.title: Reporting system leader election status

panels.description: Timestamp of the start time of the process.
panels.title: Start time

panels.description: Total user and system CPU time spent in seconds.
panels.title: CPU time spent

panels.description: Number of open file descriptors.
panels.title: Open file descriptors

panels.description: Maximum number of open file descriptors.
panels.title: Maximum file descriptors

panels.description: Virtual memory size in bytes.
panels.title: Virtual memory size

panels.description: Maximum amount of virtual memory available in bytes.
panels.title: Maximum virtual memory size

panels.description: Resident memory size in bytes.
panels.title: Resident memory size

panels.description: Number of HTTP requests, partitioned by status code, method, and host.
panels.title: Number of HTTP requests

panels.description: Total number of adds handled by workqueue
panels.title: Total adds

panels.description: Total number of retries handled by workqueue
panels.title: Total retries

panels.description: Current depth of workqueue
panels.title: Workqueue depth

panels.description:
How many seconds of work has been done that is in progress and hasn't been observed by work_duration. Large values indicate stuck threads.

One can deduce the number of stuck threads by observing the rate at which this increases.
panels.title: Unfinished work duration

panels.description: How many seconds has the longest running processor for workqueue been running.
panels.title: Longest running processor time

panels.description:
How long in seconds an item stays in workqueue before being requested.

99% of items stay up to this amount of time in the workqueue.
panels.title: Queue duration - 99th percentile

panels.description:
How long in seconds an item stays in workqueue before being requested.

50% of items stay up to this amount of time in the workqueue.
panels.title: Queue duration - 50th percentile

panels.description:
How long in seconds processing an item from workqueue takes.

99% of items stay up to this amount of time in process.
panels.title: Processing duration - 99th percentile

panels.description:
How long in seconds processing an item from workqueue takes.

50% of items stay up to this amount of time in process.
panels.title: Processing duration - 50th percentile
